DOC.detailed_description: Subjects receive follow treatment crossover design : Treatment A ( Reference ) : One 200 mg capsule TR-701 di-sodium phosphate salt ( equivalent 150 mg TR-700 ) administer orally least 8-hour fast 240 mL room temperature water ; Treatment B ( Test ) : One 182 mg capsule TR-701 free acid phosphate ( equivalent 150 mg TR-700 ) administer orally least 8-hour fast 240 mL room temperature water ; Descriptive statistic calculate PK parameter include Cmax , Tmax , AUC0-t , AUC0-inf .
